tool.name: Plink
tool.command: ./plink.sh $input $fileout $filelog $export $frequency $max_freq $allow_missing $nb_alleles_min $nb_alleles_max $type_p $bound_start $bound_end #if str( $samples ) == "": 'None' #else $samples #end if #if str( $chromosomes ) == "": 'None' #else $chromosomes #end if #if str( $export ) == "plink": $fileout_map #else '' #end if

param.name: allow_missing
param.label: Missing data proportion
param.help: Allowed missing data proportion per site. Must be comprised between 0 and 1.

param.name: bound_start
param.label: Lower bound
param.help: Lower bound for a range of sites to be processed.

param.name: bound_end
param.label: Upper bound
param.help: Upper bound for a range of sites to be processed.

data.name: fileout
data.label: ${fileout_label}.#if str($export)=='plink' then 'ped' else '' # #if str($export)=='freq' then 'frq' else '' # #if str($export)=='VCF' then 'vcf' else '' #
